title: A necessary discourse concerning the right which the house of Guyze pretendeth to the crowne of France. Faithfully translated out of the French
author: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623.
publisher: Imprinted [by G. Robinson] for Edward Aggas,
notes: A translation (by Edward Aggas?) of: Mornay, Philippe de. Discours sur le droit prétendu par ceux de Guise sur la couronne de France.
Based on: Rosières, François de.  Stemmatum Lotharingiae ac Barri.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
